meanings.sent1: The penis helps a man make babies.
meanings.sent2: He felt proud of his penis.
meanings.sent3: The doctor checked his penis to make sure it was healthy.
meanings.sent4: His penis stood tall like a soldier.
meanings.sent5: The penis is an important part of the male body.

meanings.definition: A slang term for the male genitalia
meanings.sent1: He joked about his friend's penis size.
meanings.sent2: The comedian made a funny comment about penises.
meanings.sent3: The boys laughed at the word 'penis' during class.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was as big as his penis.
meanings.sent5: The slang word 'penis' can make people giggle.
